statements: DELETE FROM OutliersDetection WHERE is_outlier = TRUE
DELETE FROM OutliersDetection WHERE data_value > 100 AND is_outlier = TRUE;
DELETE FROM Outliers WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM Outliers WHERE value < 50)
DELETE FROM outliers_results WHERE analysis_id IN (SELECT id FROM outliers_analysis WHERE std_deviation > 3.0);
DELETE FROM filtered_data WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM outliers_data WHERE value < (SELECT mean FROM data_statistics))
